tutorial.step1Desc: Complete listed quests to earn points and rewards.
tutorial.step2Desc: Earn tokens by completing quests and participating in games.
tutorial.step3Desc: Manage your earned items in inventory and spin gacha for bonus rewards.
tutorial.finalStepDesc: Enjoy completing quests and earning rewards!
